scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test --prefix backend" "npm run test --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-deps: npm i && npm i --prefix frontend && npm i --prefix backend
